title: down cake
description: Agave nectar and a maple syrup custard enhance and enrich natural pineapple sweetness in this cake. Who needs refined sugar?For this recipe you will need a deep 30x20cm/12x8in baking tin.
ingredients: 200g/7oz agave nectar (light and mild), plus 4 tbsp for the base and to drizzle
1 x 425g tin pineapple slices in fruit juice, drained and patted dry with kitchen roll
8 frozen cherries, defrosted and stones removed
